data_processing module¶

data_processing.create_bipartite_graph(reviews)[source]¶

Create bipartite graph from list of Review objects. :param reviews: list of Review objects :type reviews: list

Returns:

bipartite graph of users conneted to products they reviewed

Return type:

B (nx.Graph)

data_processing.filter_bipart_graph(graph, min_reviews=3)[source]¶

Filter out nodes with too low degree from bipartiate graph. :param graph: bipartite graph :type graph: nx.Graph :param min_reviews: minimal degree of nodes to keep :type min_reviews: int

Returns:

filtered graph

Return type:

graph (nx.Graph)

data_processing.generate_product_projection(bipartite_graph)[source]¶

Generate product projection from bipartite graph. If two products were reviewed by the same user, they are connected in the projection. If connction already exists, weight is increased by 1. :param bipartite_graph: bipartite graph of users connected to products they reviewed :type bipartite_graph: nx.Graph

Returns:

product projection graph

Return type:

product_graph (nx.Graph)

data_processing.load_graph(filename)[source]¶

Load graph from file. :param filename: path to file with saved graph :type filename: str

Returns:

loaded graph

Return type:

graph(nx.Graph)

data_processing.process_reviews(input_path, error_log='../output/error_lines.txt')[source]¶

Process reviews from JSON input file to list of Review objects. :param input_path: path to input file :type input_path: str :param error_log: path to error log file :type error_log: str

Returns:

list of Review objects

Return type:

reviews (list)

data_processing.save_graph(graph, filename)[source]¶

Save graph to file. :param graph: graph to save :type graph: nx.Graph :param filename: path to file :type filename: str

Returns:

None

Cluster-based social network analysis for review graph
